悶.definition: bored; depressed; melancholy; sealed; airtight; tightly closed

悶熱.definition: sultry; sultriness; hot and stuffy; stifling hot

悶聲發大財.definition: to amass wealth while keeping a low profile (idiom)

悶葫蘆.definition: lit. closed gourd; fig. enigma; complete mystery; taciturn person

悶酒.definition: alcohol drunk to drown one's sorrows

悶騷.definition: (coll.) outwardly cold or retiring but deep and passionate inside
